name: py-bdbag

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
The bdbag utilities are a collection of software programs for working
with BagIt packages that conform to the BDBag and Bagit/RO profiles.

dependencies.name: py-bagit
dependencies.description:
bagit is a Python library and command line utility for working with
BagIt style packages.

dependencies.name: py-bagit-profile
dependencies.description: A simple Python module for validating BagIt profiles.

dependencies.name: py-certifi
dependencies.description:
Certifi: A carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for
validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the
identity of TLS hosts.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pytz
dependencies.description: World timezone definitions, modern and historical.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-tzlocal
dependencies.description: tzinfo object for the local timezone.
